LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.Title: Anomalies Expected
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BakingPies.Re: 將每次複製派的數量限制在 {0} (0爲無限制)
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BakingPies.De: 當派母體被摧毀時也摧毀所有複製派
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BakingPies.Sp: 當巨大的派複製時收到消息
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BeamTarget.Po: 軌道光束精確靶向器需要發信器本身才能使用
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BeamTarget.Be: 當發信器脫離收容時收到信件消息而非普通提示
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.ResearchTab.U: 嘗試解鎖 Anomalies Expected 的研究項目
